Thank you to everyone for your submissions and votes! We got many great submissions this time, makes me wish we could post more than 4 entries! 

 Based on the votes, we have chosen the Top 4 submissions. Let's go from Bronze to Platinum:
BRONZE - by @jesper18
"Merry Driftmas"
> Link to the submission on Discord
SILVER - by @lastatin

"Imagine a quiet, clear evening on the eve of Christmas. It's tempting to stroll down a quiet street, illuminated by lanterns and surrounded by snowmen. 
 The lines from the poem "Night. Street. Lantern. Pharmacy." come to mind."
> Link to the submission on Discord
GOLD - by @kensuke9227 and @ze_pereira
We got a tie for the Gold submissions! So I'll include them both:
"rope from power line". Very creative!
> Link to the submission on Discord
"Slippery roads â„ï¸"
> Link to the submission on Discord
PLATINUM - by @Newanzi
"It looks like Mr. Grinch has stepped his game up! ðŸŽ„"
> Link to the submission on Discord

And the winner is: Newanzi!
Congratulations for taking the most awesome Christmas photo!
This concludes the 2025 TCU Christmas Photo Op. Thank you to everyone for participating and voting, we especially got great submissions this time!
You can find the rest of the submissions here:
> Christmas Photo Op 2025 submissions on the TCU Discord
I wish you all a happy new year, may 2026 be good to you!
- whammy4
